trans-unit.source: Defines a configuration element for an announcement endpoint.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.AnnouncementEndpointElement"></xref> class.

When called or overridden by a derived class, creates and initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint"></xref> class that uses the contract description of the current Discovery protocol version.
Not used.
An announcement endpoint.
Gets or sets the version of the WS-Discovery specification that the announcement endpoint supports.
The WS-Discovery version.
Gets the type of the announcement endpoint.
The type of the announcement endpoint.
Converts the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint"></xref> into an <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint"></xref>.
The service endpoint object to convert.
Gets or sets the maximum delay a service is required to wait before sending announcement messages.
Each service must wait for a random period of time to elapse before sending announcement messages.
This property sets the maximum amount of time (in milliseconds) the service waits.
The maximum delay.
When called or overridden by a derived class, converts the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint"></xref> to an announcement endpoint.
The service endpoint to which announcement configuration settings are applied.
Not used.
When called or overridden by a derived class, converts the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint"></xref> to an announcement endpoint.
The service endpoint to which announcement configuration settings are applied.
Not used.
When called or overridden by a derived class, initializes and validates the specified instance of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ChannelEndpointElement"></xref>.
The channel endpoint element to initialize and validate.
When called or overridden by a derived class, initializes and validates the specified instance of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement"></xref>.
The service endpoint element to initialize and validate.

When called or overridden in a derived class, gets a collection of the configuration settings contained in the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.AnnouncementEndpointElement"></xref> instance.
A collection of configuration settings.
